displayTraitsInJadeOrWaila.desc:: Whether display the traits on a mob in jade/waila(has to be installed to show): default:true

noTraitWeight.desc:: Set the weight of getting no trait, the higher this is the lower the probability of received a trait for the entity. default:2.0

maxTraits.desc:: Set maximum amount of traits that can be rolled. default:3

entityBlackList.desc:: List of mobs which are not allowed to receive traits, example:  ["minecraft:zombie", "minecraft:creeper"]

traitBlackList.desc:: List of traits which are not allowed to appear, example:  ["evolution:armored", "evolution:mutant"]
